A.text: Harvey Specter - You're confident and charismatic, with a knack for getting what you want.

B.text: Mike Ross - You're intelligent and resourceful, using your knowledge to navigate challenges.

C.text: Donna Paulsen - You're the heart of your group, valued for your loyalty and emotional intelligence.

D.text: Jessica Pearson - You're a born leader, ambitious and always thinking several steps ahead.

answers.text: With confidence and charm, I can talk my way through anything.
I focus on the facts and figures; logic always leads the way.
I seek advice from those I trust and then make a plan.
Pressure fuels my creativity, and I find unconventional solutions.

questions.question_name: What's your approach to solving problems?

answers.text: I trust my gut and my ability to read people.
Methodically, with thorough research and preparation
By building strong alliances and using my network.
With persistence and a bit of bending the rules if necessary.

questions.question_name: How would your friends describe you?
Pick a quote that resonates with you the most?

answers.text: I don't play the odds, I play the man.
When you're backed against the wall, break the goddamn thing down.
